title: So, we're well on our way to February which means Blood Moon...
body:
Any chance Blood Moon Elise can get a Chroma that actually looks like a Blood Moon skin?

**My Version**
https://i.imgur.com/g1jDWp8.png

**Original**
https://i.imgur.com/966NobJ.png

replies.body: Oh this might be a chance for a cool skin for Aure-- BLOOD MOON YI/MF/EZ/LUX!!!

> [{quoted}](name=Stars Shaper,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=b8w6QZNr,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-01-13T14:11:20.263+0000)
>
> Oh this might be a chance for a cool skin for Aure-- BLOOD MOON YI/MF/EZ/LUX!!!

{{sticker:sg-janna}}
Didnt yi already get a skin recently?
Don't hold their beer.

Forgot Karthus, Ahri, Ashe, evelynn and.......kayle, you did. 


--------

Actually i am kinda wondering if that last one could not actually be done into something neat.

You're list confuses me.

Is this a list of champions who receive skins commonly or champions who could retrieve blood  moon skins?

ops, meant to write karthus but i was watching a video of kayn´s gameplay and short circuited for a moment x)


But all those champs have a lot of skins and are/used to be fairly popular.
I'm just bad memeing some Riot favoritism, not trying to make sense :P

I sense some heavy sarcasm in this comment, but I'm too distracted by the prospect of Bloodmoon Lux to care
https://i.imgur.com/0U9lzqe.png[/img]

dont forget {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}} {{champion:103}}
I don't think MF or Lux have a chance but I honestly won't be surprised if we get Blood Moon Ezreal or a ton of chromas for Blood Moon Jhin
Blood Moon Jhin Chromas would be nice but are alas unnecessary

I wish Shen's BloodMoon skin had red particle changes like a reddish tether between him and the sword, and a reddish glow to his abilities and maybe even some new sound effects whenever he ults, but that's just me hoping.
Riot: "Who's Shen?"
he clearly means Janna!

> [{quoted}](name=Tails9016,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=b8w6QZNr,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-01-13T09:08:56.302+0000)
>
> Riot: "Who's Shen?"

Ya know that shit whos always played in pro play because of his ultimate then u nerf him and in soloq hes trash.
The nerf on his Q damage made it impossible to cs under turret until like lvl 6 or some level higher.

It wouldn't fit ryze and they aren't gonna give it to Eve since the rework is basically like a new skin. Having it be on Noc on Aurelion would be cool but having it for Kayn would also be really cool.

> [{quoted}](name=Doozku,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=b8w6QZNr,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-01-14T02:50:59.329+0000)
>
> It wouldn't fit ryze and they aren't gonna give it to Eve since the rework is basically like a new skin. Having it be on Noc on Aurelion would be cool but having it for Kayn would also be really cool.

*Cough*, Blood moon evelynn

Reworks aren't new skins. Taric got Pool Party 2 months after his release and Fiora got Project about 5 or so. A champion receiving a rework seems to have little impact on when their next skin will be released.
to correct this, fiora got her skin 1 month after her VGU and yes taric got hs skin 2 months after his release.

I wouldn't count on bloodmoon returning in febuary.
The only 3 events that always return are lunar revel,harrowing and snowdown.
Even pool party gets sometimes left out.
The last few years they've consistently come out by February.

Bloodmoon has come out in many different times of the year.  Jan, Feb, May.  They aren't always February, plus we have a TON of stuff already coming in the next 2 patches that will fill out part of February. So we might not even see them this year.

You mean 2 years?
Like how pool party came out in 2012 and 2013 and then didn't come out in 2014?
(and it also got only chromas in 2017,even though the previous years had multiple skins).

I'm not saying it is impossible for bloodmoon to come out in febuary,just that it isn't guaranteed.
How about I rephrase this - Riot seems to have made an effort to normalise the point in the season when their Blood Moon skins have been and  will be released over the last 2-to-3 years.

I don't quite think release schedules work that way.

Project was routinely released around July - August over the past few years, but then last year we got them late. 

I frankly think that the skins team attempts to regulate things, but it's never a guarantee + we already have a lot of stuff coming out this feb.
The team working on the Project game mode might have dictated to the skins team when they wanted the skins to be released.

I still kinda doubt this.
Bloodmoon simply seems like a popular skin series to me that coincidentally got skins in the same month 2 times in a row.
Before that we got the Bloodmoon skins at random times of the year.
I mean, by the end of February we'll know for sure. In the meantime I'll have a bit of faith in Riot and start theorising what the next Blood Moon skin could be.
Yes!

I think we need a blood moon lux skin, about time we get another lux skin. 

*sarcasm

Silver > Gold

{{sticker:garen-swing}}
